subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: In June, one of the five finalists, whose essays were chosen from 56,374 entrees, will play the site of the 2008 United States Open, on the Friday before the first round.
snippet: In June, one of the five finalists, whose essays were chosen from 56,374 entrees, will play the site of the 2008 United States Open, on the Friday before the first round.
